## RigidBody.addChildColliderToSimulation() method

Adds an unsimulated child collider to the rigid body for the simulation it belongs to.

**Signature:**

```typescript
addChildColliderToSimulation(collider: Collider): void;
```

</th><th>

Description

collider


</td><td>

[Collider](./server.collider.md)


</td><td>

The child collider to add to the rigid body for the simulation it belongs to.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

void
